about_the_game:
Welcome to the misty, untamed wilderness of Medieval Scotland in "Highland Keep," a game that combines survival, strategy, and role-playing elements. Step into the shoes of a clan chieftain who must build, manage, and defend a stronghold. Lead your clan to survival in this unforgiving environment, where every decision can mean the difference between life and death.

Strategic Castle Building

Craft your fortress from the ground up with a deep, strategy-based building system. Design your Keep's layout to optimize resource gathering, fortifications, and defense mechanisms. Build a variety of structures including walls, towers, barracks, and workshops, each with its unique purpose and upgrade path. Balance the needs of your clan by managing resources like food, wood, and stone while preparing for relentless assaults.

Immersive Third-Person Gameplay

Switch seamlessly between strategic management and direct control of your character. Lead your clan members through challenging environments to gather essential resources, scout the land, and engage in real-time combat. Experience the thrill of battle firsthand, utilizing a combination of melee and ranged weapons while mastering skills and tactics. The third-person perspective allows for a more personal connection to your character and the world.

Dynamic Survival Mechanics

Survival in the Highlands isn't just about combat. Face the challenges of harsh weather conditions, limited resources, and wild animals. Develop a strategy to ensure your clan's survival by managing their needs—food, shelter, and safety. Every decision you make affects the well-being and morale of your clan members. Will you scavenge the wilderness for resources, or will you risk raiding neighboring clans?

Rich, Dark, and Atmospheric World

Explore a game world steeped in a dark, realistic atmosphere that captures the essence of medieval Scotland. Traverse mist-covered moors, dense forests, and rugged highlands, all meticulously designed to provide a hauntingly beautiful backdrop to your survival story. The dynamic weather and day-night cycles add to the immersion, affecting visibility, gameplay, and the behavior of your enemies.

content_descriptors.notes: Our game primarily contains violence, including scenes with blood and combat-related injuries. While the game does not depict explicit sexual content, players should be aware that it involves intense and graphic depictions of medieval combat, which may be disturbing to some

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

supported_languages:
English*, Polish
